title: Super-polynomial lower bounds for depth-4 homogeneous arithmetic formulas.
abstract: We show that any depth-4 homogeneous arithmetic formula computing the Iterated Matrix Multiplication polynomial IMM  n,d   -- the (1, 1)-th entry of the product of  d  generic  n  ×  n  matrices -- has size  n  Ω(log  n  ), if  d  = Ω (log 2   n ). More-over, any depth-4 homogeneous formula computing the determinant polynomial Det  n   -- the determinant of a generic  n  ×  n  matrix -- has size  n  Ω(log  n ) .
